data.caption: A janitor finds something unusual while cleaning out the air vents. (HLU RP)
Police hire a contractor to build an armored vehicle that pollutes the city and disturbs the homeless. (CityRP)
The banker spots a mysterious figure inside the bank vault. (CityRP)
Police officers attempt to fish in a residential pool for some reason. (CityRP)
Black Mesa personnel escape the facility after destroying everything in their path. (HLU RP)
Untitled. (Unbalanced 2)
Untitled. (OG Modded)
Untitled. (OG Modded)
Untitled. (OG Modded)
Pro-Capitalist citizen opens up a business in the city's bank vault. (CityRP)
Congratulations to Rez for being the first player to reach 1 million and buy the dump truck! (CityRP)
Citizen barricades his business after the mayor fails to contain the riots happening around the city. (CityRP)
Government officials prepare to use their crowd control vehicle, the SS Skyrim. (CityRP)
The mayor pretends to play Cyberpunk while hiding from an escaped fugitive. (CityRP)
After being overthrown, the mayor was forced to be covered in a sticky white substance by the new mayor and his men. (CityRP)
Ditto, but now the new mayor and his men are sending the old mayor to the moon for his crimes. (CityRP)
Aftermath of an angry tow truck driver ramming his truck into the PD garage after officers impounded his car for investigation. (CityRP)
Police find a disturbing scene in Florida man's apartment. (CityRP)
Security deals with intruders at the main entrance after they attempted to force their way into the Xen portal. (HLU RP)
The mayor sentences a pastor to death after he was found guilty of four counts of vehicular homicide. (CityRP)
Civilian gets turned into a punching bag as punishment for being a drug lord. (CityRP)
Police and EMS work to clean up the city after the mayor attempts to create a society without technology. (CityRP)
Police get ready to breach a door after a pursuit suspect crashes his car and barricades himself in a restaurant. (CityRP)
Police detain an SCP and call in a scientist to experiment with it. (CityRP)
The mayor and his men celebrate after turning everyone in the city against each other. (CityRP)
An outbreak forces police to close off a section of the city. (CityRP)
The mayor, police, and a random citizen work together to take down a threat to the city. (CityRP)
Mr. X goes bowling. (Sandbox)
Firefighters wreck their fire truck and ironically set the fire station on fire. (CityRP)
The mayor robs himself. (CityRP)
The mayor crucifies himself as part of his new religion. (CityRP)
The mayor dances to victory music after successfully defeating the rouge police force that formed after he established his religion. (CityRP)
Firefighters use an abandoned building as practice. (CityRP)
The mayor orders a rebellious citizen to watch Reddit cringe videos for his crimes against the city. (CityRP)
Black Mesa personnel prepare to run a totally safe test involving a totally stable sample. (HLU RP)
Mr. X goes shopping for a new chair. (CityRP)
Gang members take over a warehouse a heavily barricade it so they can run their drug business in peace. (CityRP)
Security officers help a survey member get through Xen after encountering hostile creatures. (HLU RP)
Weapon specialist works with security to set up an armory in the facility to help the survey team with their missions. (HLU RP)
Citizens loyal to the Combine set up a base in the sewers. (HLU RP)
Citizen is detained by combine forces after being found helping a rebel through a secret door. (HLU RP)
Combine forces let a rebel tell them jokes before being executed for his crimes. (HLU RP)
The police chief orders all units to form a roadblock up to the mountains to prevent bank robbers from escaping back to their base. (CityRP)
A rogue SWAT officer sets up a base after the mayor orders his loyal officers to hunt down the renegade. (CityRP)
A news cameraman is detained after he was caught illegally filming a local gun shop. (CityRP)
Citizen attaches armor to his vehicle to prepare for a zombie outbreak. (CityRP)
A new mayor forces himself into office after defeating the old one, and constructs statues to celebrate. (CityRP)
The corrupt mayor and his bodyguards set up money printers in city hall, which unfortunately caused a massive fire just moments later. (CityRP)
Citizens burn down and loot a marijuana dispensary during a purge. (CityRP)
Government officials and civilians team up and establish a base in the mountains after a zombie outbreak hits the city. (CityRP)
Police officers open a casino at the station while the mayor is out of town. (CityRP)
Citizens pose for a photo after taking down the mayor who was hiding while a purge was active. (CityRP)
Citizen barricades himself in his apartment after being accused of possessing an illegal alien artifact. (CityRP)
Police investigate a suspicious object found on the back of a citizens truck. The object has been reported to cause anyone who gets too close to it to go insane. (CityRP)
Citizens set fire to local supermarket after the mayor unexpectedly starts the purge. (CityRP)
Anarchist is detained after vandalizing city hall and attempting to flee police. (CityRP)
Untitled. (Various Gamemodes)
Untitled. (Various Gamemodes)
Untitled. (Various Gamemodes)
After a long manhunt, police find the suspect hidden at the fairgrounds. (CityRP)
Chalmers sends Skinner to the moon after being fed up with him. (Sandbox))
The facility administrator watches a biochemist demonstrate the capabilities of a new device that lets him control aliens. (HLU RP)
Firefighters are dispatched to a car fire that quickly spread over the dry foliage. (CityRP)
The mayor acts as judge for a trial at the city hall court. (CityRP)
A lawyer interviews his client before the trial begins. (CityRP)
SWAT approaches an armed man who barricaded himself inside of a gas station. (CityRP)
Police and bodyguards of the mayor question a citizen who is playing loud music in front of city hall. (CityRP)
Corrupt police prepare a torture room for misbehaving hobos. (Simple DarkRP)
An accident involving overheating money printers ends in a house being totally engulfed in flames. (CityRP)
A sniper takes position on a roof and prepares for the mayor to come out. (CityRP)
Police pin a fleeing suspect into a building, allowing them to safely detain him. (CityRP)
Terrorists attempt to ram into city hall but are stopped by a detective firing at them. (CityRP)
The mayor is seen fishing out on a local lake. (CityRP)
Untitled. (Simple DarkRP)
The Rockford police station gets fortified after an armed criminal breaks out of prison and shoots at officers. (CityRP)
Police and federal agents arrest a fleeing criminal who was caught with a money printer. (CityRP)
SWAT engages with cartel members after learning about their hideout location. (CityRP)
Religious cult kidnaps the mayor and kills him as part of a ritual. (CityRP)
Police chase a gunman to a supermarket, while a citizen tries to help the gunman, while a hitman chases the citizen helping the gunman. (CityRP)
Hit-and-run driver causes a violent crash inside a tunnel. (CityRP)
Mayor orders a wall be built near city hall to keep the illegals away. (CityRP)
Police prevent a street race by placing spike strips on the track. (CityRP)
A medic performs a psychological test on a biochemist to ensure he is safe to work at the facility. (HLU RP)
A scientist's hopes and dreams are buried in the middle of the hallway. (HLU RP)
A biochemist traps an illegal alien behind bulletproof glass for experiments. (HLU RP)
A technician sets up a server system for Black Mesa personnel. (HLU RP)
An HECU Marine prepares to detonate a nuclear device in an underground storage facility. (HLU RP)
Rebels create a giant fortress to escape imprisonment by the mayor. (CityRP)
Police respond to a bank robbery and are met with heavy resistance inside. (CityRP)
Gang members set up a drug house in an abandoned warehouse. (Simple DarkRP)
Mayor broadcasts a questionable activity inside the city bank vault. (CityRP)
Citizen vandalizes supermarket to send a message to the people of the city. (CityRP)
The mayor shows off a new office built for his bodyguard as an early Christmas present. (CityRP)
Citizen sets up a monument to praise EA for their wonderful games. (CityRP)
Man barricades himself in a house to escape police. (CityRP)
Hobo builds himself a shelter inside an abandoned building. (CityRP)
Combine units find the body of their leader inside of his office. His death is still under investigation. (HLU RP)
Citizen learns a valuable lesson about speeding after spinning out of control and getting stuck on the highway. (CityRP)
Citizens steal a car and proceed to burn it in an attempt to cover up the crime. (CityRP)
HECU Marines prepare for nuclear detonation hundreds of feet underground. (HLU RP)
Rebels defeat multiple Combine helicopters over their base. (HLU RP)
Citizens construct a memorial to honor the fallen in a war between loyal citizens and rebels that divided the city. (CityRP)
Firefighters run a training exercise in an old apartment building. (CityRP)
The mayor is very happy to see his city's economy doing well. (CityRP)
Business is booming at a local gun store. (CityRP)
A cook sets up shop in an old apartment complex. (CityRP)
A tow truck is called to the scene of a collision involving a delivery truck and a police cruiser. (CityRP)
SWAT units and a paramedic armor their vehicles to prepare for a battle against rebels in the city. (CityRP)
The mayor isolates himself from the rest of the city after hobos attempt to take over. (Simple DarkRP)
Civil Protection units interview a new citizen that arrived in the city. (HLU RP)
Local PMC headquarters is burnt down after authorities find illegal drugs inside. (CityRP)
Corrupt government officials help the mayor move drugs to his office. (CityRP)
Medic revives a scientist who was killed during an alien invasion. (HLU RP)
Hobos tear down the wall that separated them from the rest of the city. (Simple DarkRP)
Refugees fortify in an abandoned building to take cover from Combine attacks. (HLU RP)
Local residents meet with the mayor to discuss laws. (CityRP)
Security detains a medic conducting questionable experiments on human remains. (HLU RP)
Police units secure a government-owned house after threats were made to kill the mayor. (CityRP)
Police force gets ready to handle an unexpected visitor at the mayor's office. (CityRP)
Local news interviews mayor in his office. (CityRP)
Firefighters arrive on scene after bank robbers set the building on fire. (CityRP)
Communist mayor orders officers to burn down a cabin with a capitalist inside. (CityRP)
Mayor Donald Trump takes on Mexican, who refuses to be deported. (CityRP)
Players gather in a local hotel for a drug party. (CityRP)
